Title: The Evil Dead
Overview: Five vacationing college students unwittingly resurrect demonic spirits through the Book of the Dead. Now there is no escape. The guilty must be punished.
Tagline: The Ultimate Experience In Grueling Terror
Keywords: falsely accused, beheading, audio tape, log cabin, chain saw, giant plant, aggression by plant, lodge, friends, stop motion, evil, occult, book of the dead, necronomicon, demonic possession, video nasty, unofficial remake
